data.title: International Appearances
data.text:
Haitham Zein - International Appearances

The outstanding Lebanese player obtained 50 international caps with his National Team. All matches are friendlies unless stated otherwise.

Born: 6- 1-1979 Country: Lebanon Caps: 50 (W13-D19-L18  GF63-GA68  %45.00) Goals: 17 (% 0.34 per match) Age First Cap: 18 yr 167 d 22- 6-1997 vs. Kuwait 1-3 Age Last Cap: 25 yr 165 d 19- 6-2004 vs. Syria 1-3 National Team Career: 5 yr 363 d
